tool_description: A comprehensive API for accessing various Twitch data, including stream data, streamer information, chat data, and channel points.

api_list.name: Get Channel Points Context
api_list.description: Retrieves information about channel points for a specified channel.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve channel points information.

api_list.name: Get Stream Views
api_list.description: Returns the number of viewers currently watching a specified stream.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve stream view information.

api_list.name: Get Streamer Info
api_list.description: Fetches detailed information about a specified streamer.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel of the streamer to retrieve information for.

api_list.name: Get Channel Panels
api_list.description: Retrieves the panels associated with a specified Twitch channel.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve panels.

api_list.name: Get Stream Tags
api_list.description: Returns the tags associated with a specified stream.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve stream tags.

api_list.name: Get Channel Leaderboards
api_list.description: Retrieves the leaderboard for a specified channel.

optional_parameters.name: channel
optional_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve the leaderboard.

api_list.name: Get Channel Goals
api_list.description: Fetches the goals set for a specified channel.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve goals.

api_list.name: Get Pinned Chat
api_list.description: Retrieves the pinned chat messages for a specified channel.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve pinned chat messages.

api_list.name: Get Chat Restrictions
api_list.description: Returns the chat restrictions for a specified channel.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve chat restrictions.

api_list.name: Get User Id
api_list.description: Retrieves the user ID for a specified channel.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve the user ID.

api_list.name: Get Channel Videos
api_list.description: Fetches the videos associated with a specified channel.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve videos.

api_list.name: Get Viewer Card (Pleb info)
api_list.description: Retrieves the viewer card information for a specified user in a channel.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The username of the viewer for whom to retrieve card information.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The Twitch channel for which to retrieve viewer card information.
